code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a 77 YO white m retired presents w/ c/o 3 days h/o severe seeing halos around light, severe cloudiness in both eyes, severe blurry and double vision and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. o:Height 166 cm, Weight 91.8 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15 a:Cataracts p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

td.content: s:a white male aged 77 yrs presents with 15 months history of severe cloudiness in both eyes. he denies drinking alcohol Patient does not smoke o:Height 166 cm, Weight 92.8 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 73, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16 a:Cataracts p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Extracapsular cataract extraction (ECCE) - eye.
